tool_description: Analyzes time series data to identify seasonal patterns, cycles, and recurring trends that impact demand forecasting accuracy.

time_series_data.description: Array of numerical values representing the time series

frequency.description: Data frequency: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly

error_messages: Insufficient data: Time series must contain at least 24 data points for meaningful analysis
Invalid frequency: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly]
Invalid seasonal periods: All periods must be positive integers
Significance level out of range: Must be between 0.01 and 0.1
usage: Input time_series_data array and specify frequency. Optionally define suspected seasonal_periods and significance_level for detection.

seasonal_components.description: Seasonal component values for each period
